data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Shady Move
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokémon to another Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Flare Navigate
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Absorb Life
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

data.name: Chandelure

attacks.name: Flame Burst
attacks.text: Does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Inferno
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

data.name: Chandelure

attacks.name: Spirit Burner
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. This attack does 60 more damage for each Pokémon you discarded in this way. Then, put any number of Fire Pokémon you discarded in this way onto your Bench.

data.flavorText: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Protective Glow
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon that have Energy attached have no Weakness.

attacks.name: Mirage Flare
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Fainting Spell
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.text: Put 6 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

data.flavorText: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Sinister Selection
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.

attacks.name: Past Friends
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Supporter card in your discard pile.

data.flavorText: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Cursed Shadow
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Eerie Glow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

data.flavorText: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

data.name: Chandelure-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Eerie Glow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Cursed Shadow
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Eerie Glow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

data.flavorText: This extremely rare Pokémon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.

data.name: Chandelure

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Vortex of Pain
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on all of your opponent's Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

data.name: Chandelure V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 40 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

data.name: Chandelure VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Cursed Shimmer
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't play any Pokémon Tool cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Max Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 70 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

data.name: Chandelure V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 40 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

data.name: Chandelure VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Cursed Shimmer
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't play any Pokémon Tool cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Max Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 70 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Mountain Roasting
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Mountain Roasting
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.

data.name: Chandelure

attacks.name: Combustion Chain
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of lights, funerals were a constant occurrence—or so it's said.

data.name: Chandelure

abilities.name: Alluring Light
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may have each player draw a card.

attacks.name: Mind Ruler
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each card in your opponent's hand.

data.flavorText: It absorbs spirits, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

data.name: Chandelure

attacks.name: Incendiary Pillar
attacks.text: If you have 10 or more Basic Fire Energy cards in your discard pile, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Burn It All Up
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.
